content: create a stunning handmade ornament with this iceberg bauble crochet pattern ❄️ this beginner-friendly pattern features the spike stitch adding elegant texture to your holiday décor it fits snugly around a flat plastic bauble ensuring a perfect round shape every time made with red and white cotton worsted yarn and a 4 mm hook ✨ pattern features - easy spike stitch design - step-by-step written pattern - full video tutorial included - uses only cotton yarn for crisp definition -beginner-friendly and quick to make perfect for christmas décor holiday gifts stocking stuffers or craft fairs free-to-view on my website or **the pattern can be purchased here as an ad-free printer-friendly pdf ** love ornament patterns ***you can also get this pattern in an ornament crochet ebook with 40 crochet patterns and lots of tutorials and tips and 13+ videos right here 2 *** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 600 adfree patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/the-crochet-club/ ref=ravelry 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-ornaments-made-easy-vol2/ ref=ravelry
